description: Five foreigners who have been touched by Singapore choose to live a slice of Singapore life back home. This National Day, they tell their own stories.
title: Taking home a piece of Singapore
title_page: Taking home a piece of Singapore: 5 foreigners on their ties to city-state | The Straits Times
maintext:
Hello, hello, hello! My name is Sachiyo.
I’m a Japanese singer-songwriter but I was raised in Singapore.
My favourite Singlish is “makan” and “shiok”
because I like eating.
